name: CTRL + ALT + RIGHT + DELETE
description:
Cure these wayward souls of their evil beliefs!

CARD is a simple tower defense style game about ridding our world of the neo-nazi scourge, using the power of love! This game is short and sweet, with dope beats and flashy pixel-art aesthetics that make for a candy-coated experience 🍭🍬

All of the art and programming are done by me, the music is courtesy of Psykick: http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Psykick/52938

Contact: waveydigital@gmail.com
